T02D2780:150a-0: @150a * // spyan ras gzigs ting nge 'dzin rab tu brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2780:150a-1: gang zhig ting 'dzin ri dbang po ltar g-yeng ba'i rlung gis mi bskyod cing //
T02D2780:150a-2: shin tu 'od gsal ston ka'i mkha' la nyi 'od dra ba bkram 'dra ba //
T02D2780:150a-3: gnyis med bde chen rtogs dka'i rtog pas rtog tu dges bzhugs 'dzum pa'i zhal //
T02D2780:150a-4: bsam gtan mchog gi phyag rgyas mnyam gzhag mnyam med mgon po nyid rtag 'dud //
T02D2780:150a-5: sgrub po gang zhig sgrub pa'am //
T02D2780:150a-6: ngo bo nyid kyis rnyed pa yi //
T02D2780:150a-7: ting 'dzin rab tu mi brtan pa //
T02D2780:150a-8: de dag brtan pa'i thabs 'dir bshad //
T02D2780:150a-9: shin tu dben pa'i gnas nyid du //
T02D2780:150a-10: lus dang sems ni rab dal bas //
T02D2780:150a-11: rgya chen mchod sbyin byas nas su //
T02D2780:150a-12: man ngag gsum gyi dang po bsgom //
T02D2780:150a-13: ma lus 'gro la byams sogs tshad med tshangs pa'i gnas pas legs gnas la //
T02D2780:150a-14: ji skad bshad pa'i ting 'dzin phyag rgyas dpa' bo chen po mnyam gzhag bya //
T02D2780:150a-15: de rjes mtshan bcas mtshan med cho gas mgon po la gus gsol btab la //
T02D2780:150a-16: sbyor ba gsum pa'i rnal 'byor rgyal pos rtse gcig brtan par yang dag bsgom //
T02D2780:150a-17: tha mal rang lus dkyil 'khor dbus //
T02D2780:150a-18: snying dkyil padmo dbye ba'i nang //
T02D2780:150a-19: rdo rje 'dzin pa legs bsgoms la //
T02D2780:150a-20: de yi nang na'ang mgon po nyid //
T02D2780:150a-21: de bzhin de yi snying po ni //
T02D2780:150a-22: dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs pa //
T02D2780:150a-23: sgrub po'i ting 'dzin brtan pa'i rgyu //
T02D2780:150a-24: ye shes chen po hr'i: yig go //
T02D2780:150a-25: de ni gnyis su med sems rgyu //
T02D2780:150a-26: de la sa bon yang dag brtan //
T02D2780:150a-27: sku gsung thugs dang ye shes dngos //
T02D2780:150a-28: 'bru bzhi phyogs bzhir rnam par bsam //
T02D2780:150a-29: mgon po nyid mthar a'a li ste //
T02D2780:150a-30: bla ma'i mthar yang k'a li'o //
T02D2780:150a-31: dbus nas brtsams te sngags bzlas shing //
T02D2780:150a-32: 'od zer sbyor bas don gnyis bsgrub //
T02D2780:150a-33: skye ba las ni phyogs bcu'i mthar thug gang dag bsam gtan ma thob pa'am //
T02D2780:150a-34: thob kyang gang zhig rnal du mi gnas ri yi rtsa rtse ltar g-yo ba //
T02D2780:150a-35: de dag de ltar skad cig yud la ri rab sra ltar brtan pa yi //
T02D2780:150a-36: ting 'dzin la bkod bde chen ro myang 'chi med mnyam gzhag cher gzhag bya //
T02D2780:150a-37: bsdus pas phyi ma phyi ma'i rim //
T02D2780:150a-38: thim gyur nang ma nang ma la //
T02D2780:150a-39: ngag dang dri med brtan pa zhes //
T02D2780:150b-0: bya ba'i @150b ming can ting 'dzin gsum //
T02D2780:150b-1: go rims ji bzhin bsgoms nas ni //
T02D2780:150b-2: gcig tu 'gro ba snying brtse bas //
T02D2780:150b-3: thun gsum zhag bdun yid byed na //
